itemDescription: English hymnwriter, born 1817 April 10; died 1877 December 07

wikipedia_page.main: Caroline Maria Noel (1817–1877) was an English hymnographer.

response: *Caroline Maria Noel (1817–1877) was known as a hymn writer.
"At the Name of Jesus" is an 1870 hymn with lyrics written by Caroline Maria Noel.
*Caroline Maria Noel (b. Teston, Kent, England, 10 April 1817,; d. St. Marylebone, Middlesex, England, 7 December 1877)
